title: Will the law add to the marijuana epidemic in the United States?
subtitle: The White House Press Minister, Sean Spieser, suggested that the Trump administration was likely to impose a ban on federal marijuana, citing the United States opium crisis as a reason to do so - an allegation inconsistent with available scientific data.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Policies that legitimize recreational marijuana are exacerbating the opioid addiction epidemic in America.
